name: 物理光學
description: 本課程銜接第1學期幾何光學課程內容,介紹與建立學生基礎的物理光學知識，使學生了解物理光學基本原理和應用，並作為未來光學實作與應用之入門工具與知識
syllabus:
1 (2/22)

Course Introduction and Overview (課程簡介與導覽)

Basic Mathematics & Physics of Waves (波的基本數學與物理)

2 (3/1)

Coherence, Interference of Planewaves, and Dispersion (同調性、平面波干涉、與色散)

3 (3/8)

Basic Mathematics & Physics of the Interference of 2 Planewaves (兩道平面波干涉的基本數學與物理)

4 (3/15)

Optical Interferometry, Interferometers, & Applications (光波干涉學、干涉儀、與其應用)

5 (3/22)

**測驗 (1):** **\[Test (1), 2 hours\];  Q&A on Test Problems {1 hour}**

6 (3/39)

Diffraction (I): Basic Concepts & Mathematics (繞射的基本原理與數學)

7 (4/5)

Diffraction (II): Point-Spread Function and Diffraction–Limited Two-Point Resolution, Diffraction Gratings & Applications 繞射(二): 繞射極限解析度、繞射光柵、與其應用

8 (4/12)

**Mid-Term Exam (****期中測驗評量)**       **\[3 hours\]**

9 (4/19)

**Polarization Optics (I): Mathematical & Graphical**

**Representations of Polarization States (****光波偏振態)**

10 (4/26)

Polarization Optics (II): Jones Calculus & Polarizations Transformation (光波偏振態之調控轉換)

11 (5/3)

Polarization Optics (III): Applications (光波偏振態的應用)

12 (5/10)

**測驗 (2):** **\[Test (2), 2 hours\];  Q&A on Test Problems {1 hour}**

13 (5/17)

Elementary Laser Theory (I) 雷射原理簡介(一)

14 (5/24)

Elementary Laser Theory (II) 雷射原理簡介(二)

15 (5/31)

Introduction to Photon Optics  光子學簡介

16 (6/7)

Introduction to Holography  全像學簡介

17 (6/14)

Reading Assignment & Report  論文導讀與報告

18 (6/21)

**Final Exam (****期末測驗評量)**      **\[3 hours\]**
